text:
If you log into your portal through ftp and edit the json file for the module you can change the line i think it's global_module = true
to false
I don't know why it doesn't let you do it through the front end, but it may mean some things don't work properly

Hi Community,

I am using a external RSS blog feed to enter in a blog/rss feed email. Any idea how I can get the email template to look like this when pulling in the information from the RSS feed?
Hey Michelle, it would depend on how the template itself is built. Some can be done through inline styles on the elements. Do you have a link to your landing page?
